values: If something is upright, it is standing up straight.
Meerkats can’t walk like humans, but they can stand upright.
n. 垂直；竖立

- adj. 正直的，诚实的；垂直的，直立的；笔直的；合乎正道的
- n. 竖立；垂直


副 词:  
uprightly

名 词:  
uprightness
